title: Kassel Labs
description:
Our mission is to help people express their creativity and imagination.

Create great experiences with Kassel Labs tools and services. Get your favorite movies and series in your presentations, invites and many other uses.

We currently have intros for:
- ⭐ Star Wars 
- 🚲 Stranger Things 
- 🖥️ Westworld 
- 👑 Game of Thrones 
- 🧪 Breaking Bad 
- 🍄 The Last of Us 
- ❌ Among Us (Ejection video)
